definition: variant of 背[bei1]
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
north/(classical) to be defeated
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]
background/backdrop/context/(fig.) powerful backer/CL:種|种[zhong3]
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
to go against/to be contrary to/to violate
the back/the reverse side/the wrong side
back (of a human or other vertebrate, or of an object)
to depart from/to deviate from/deviation
knapsack/rucksack/infantry pack/field pack/blanket roll/CL:個|个[ge4]
sleeveless garment (vest, waistcoat, singlet, tank top etc)/CL:件[jian4]
to betray
to bear/to carry on one's back/to shoulder
rear view/figure seen from behind/view of the back (of a person or object)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
to be in a poor light/to do sth with one's back to the light/to stand in one's own light

sentences.english: Capsule valves longitudinally vittate to abaxially vittate with lateral vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果纵向裂片具油道到背面具油道具侧小泡。

sentences.english: I would have carried him to the deepest part and dropped him in it.
sentences.chinese: 我会把他背到最深的地方然后把他丢下去。

sentences.english: Hency stroked Trenven's back and looked into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 汉西抚摸着川文的背，看着天空。

sentences.english: My back's crooked like a question mark.
sentences.chinese: 我妈说我的背弓得像个问号。

sentences.english: To my amazement, he was able to recite the poem from memory.
sentences.chinese: 令我大为惊奇的是，他把这首诗从头到尾背了出来。

sentences.english: To jump over in or as if in leapfrog.
sentences.chinese: 就象跳背游戏中互相跳过。

sentences.english: The 10 point is that 1 minutes of central back relaxation?
sentences.chinese: 那么10点是这1分钟中枢的背驰点吗？

sentences.english: Nevers of the muscles were dominated by the dorsal scapular nerve.
sentences.chinese: 神经支配主要是肩胛背神经。

sentences.english: This strategy prevents overeating, since you're never ravenously hungry.
sentences.chinese: 少吃多餐可以防止吃太多，因你还没有饿到肚皮贴背。

sentences.english: Her head and back felt on fire.
sentences.chinese: 她的头和背感到火烧火燎的。

sentences.english: At night before he went to bed he practiced sitting with his legs crossed, and then he stretched his back by curling himself into a ball.
sentences.chinese: 晚上上床之前，他练习盘腿坐，然后把背弯成一个球。

sentences.english: I stuttered when reciting the text today, so he criticized me directly.
sentences.chinese: 我今天背课文时磕磕巴巴的，他直冲我刮鼻子。

sentences.english: He put down a large bow and arrow that he had on his back.
sentences.chinese: 他把背上背的大弓和箭放了下来。

sentences.english: To study Dorsolateral Medullary Syndrome with MRI.
sentences.chinese: 应用MRI研究延髓背外侧综合征。

sentences.english: The last straw breaks the camels back.
sentences.chinese: 最后一根稻草能垮骆驼的背。

sentences.english: Larger muscle groups are thighs, back, and chest.
sentences.chinese: 大肌肉群在大腿，胸和背等部位。
